Docs.summary: Generate a unique name for a resource by combining the resource's as a prefix and a unique suffix based on the current resource group's ID.

Docs.param: The provisioning context for this resource.
The resource with an unset Name property.
Docs.summary: Get a unique dynamic name suffix for the given resource.
Docs.returns: A unique dynamic name suffix for the resource.
Docs.remarks: This defaults to `uniqueString(resourceGroup().id)` for most resources and `uniqueString(deployment().id)` for resource groups. This can be overridden to provide a different "entropy source."
